Fix an issue building the application because of the lack of Dropbox api placeholder values.  This fixes that with some caveats (see res/values/dropbox.xml)

Refactoring the codebase directory structure
Make sure we are using the common method for getting a Synchronizer local write handler, and make sure the base method can throw ReportableError
This improves download speeds significantly, parsing speeds can still be high but Syncs will take significantly less time.  This closes issue 49
Added the supports-screens directive to the AndroidManifest.xml file to allow for fullscreen on tablets
Modified target to allow for compatiability on devices 1.6+

- Fix a problem parsing the document title if there isn't a space after the semicolon
